# Wood's Plumbing Enterprises LLC

> Licensed plumbing contractor serving Southern Arizona since 1979. Family-owned business providing residential and commercial plumbing services including emergency repairs, water heaters, gas services, sewer lines, and leak detection across Marana, Tucson, Oro Valley, and surrounding areas. Available 24/7 for emergency plumbing services. ROC License #139011.

Wood's Plumbing Enterprises LLC is a trusted plumbing company with over 46 years of experience serving the Southern Arizona community. We specialize in all aspects of residential and commercial plumbing, from routine maintenance to complex installations and emergency repairs.

## Contact Information

- Phone: (520) 682-2233
- Address: 13415 N Marana Main St, Marana, AZ 85653
- Service Area: Marana, Tucson, Oro Valley, Sahuarita, Green Valley, Vail, Catalina, Picture Rocks
- Hours: 24/7 Emergency Service Available

## Services

- [Emergency Plumbing](/services/emergency-plumbing): 24/7 emergency plumber services for burst pipes, major leaks, and plumbing emergencies
- [Water Heater Services](/services/water-heater-installation): Installation, repair, and replacement of tank and tankless water heaters
- [Gas Line Services](/services/gas-line-installation): Licensed gas plumber for gas line installation, repair, and leak detection
- [Sewer Services](/services/sewer-line-repair): Sewer line repair, replacement, and video camera inspection
- [Leak Detection](/services/leak-detection): Advanced electronic leak detection for hidden water and slab leaks
- [Drain Cleaning](/services/drain-cleaning): Professional drain cleaning and clog removal services
- [Water Conditioning](/services/water-softener-installation): Water softener and filtration system installation
- [Repiping](/services/whole-house-repiping): Complete home repiping with copper or PEX

## Service Locations

- [Marana, AZ](/locations/marana): Primary service area and headquarters location
- [Tucson, AZ](/locations/tucson): Full plumbing services throughout Tucson metro
- [Oro Valley, AZ](/locations/oro-valley): Serving Oro Valley and surrounding communities
- [Sahuarita, AZ](/locations/sahuarita): Service available in Sahuarita and Green Valley
- [Green Valley, AZ](/locations/green-valley): Plumbing services for Green Valley residents
- [Vail, AZ](/locations/vail): Serving Vail and Rita Ranch areas
- [Catalina, AZ](/locations/catalina): Service available in Catalina Foothills
- [Picture Rocks, AZ](/locations/picture-rocks): Serving Picture Rocks community

## Credentials

- Arizona ROC License: #139011
- Bonded and Insured
- BBB Accredited Business
- Member: Plumbing-Heating-Cooling Contractors Association
- 46+ Years in Business (Est. 1979)
